subject: fundamental questions on JUnit
msgSnippet: Hi, I have gone thru the Getting Started page on JUnit, but still had some questions not answered by the articles. 1) JUnit seems to test functions that
messageBody:
Hi,
I have gone thru the Getting Started page on JUnit, but still had
some questions not answered by the articles.
1) JUnit seems to test "functions" that return a value. How will you
test "procedures" that do work instead?
(It is 'against the rules' to change the design of them to return
values - a testing tool should not force code changes.)
2) How will you test procedures that are composed of several
functions?
3) Can JUnit ever replace stepping thru with a debugger?

thanks,
Anil
aphili01@...
